detectors.description:
XdexToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XdexToken.sol#1011-1029) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XdexToken.sol#1021)
